title: VPN UNSTABLE
content: My VPN is on in Firefox, but it has a warning sign that said VPN unstable.
creator: firekat472003

title: Can I undo the 141 Firefox update?
content:
bold text I thought I had messed up my Firefox home screen somehow, when I deleted cookies and data (I am 84 and not techy, and not keen on changes!), but now I see that an update has done it. I want my old home screen back, with the 'previous tabs' feature restored instead of the 8 bookmarks that now occupy that space, most of which I rarely use. How can this be done, please? 

 I'm using Windows 11
creator: alviesusan1
